meanings.definition: (複数形扱い) グリソン地方の人々
meanings.english_definition: The people of the Grisons region (Switzerland).

meanings.definition: (単数形扱い) グリソン地方のロマンシュ語
meanings.english_definition: The Romansh language of the Grisons region (Switzerland).

etymology.value: Derived from the name of the Grisons region in Switzerland.

inflection.notes: Plural noun referring to people; singular noun referring to the Romansh language.

usage_notes.explanation: 'Grissons' can refer to the people of the Grisons region in Switzerland (plural form) or the Romansh language spoken there (singular form). Context is crucial to determine the intended meaning.
